net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter
Class PreformattedTextFilter

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter.AbstractTextFilter
      net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter.LiteralTextFilter
          net.sourceforge.taglets.simple.filter.PreformattedTextFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
TextFilter
public class PreformattedTextFilter
extends LiteralTextFilter

Text filter that is used for preformatted text output.

Acts as an identity text filter unless configured to format for preformatted text, in this case the first leading character is removed.

Purpose of this baby is to allow for preformatted output of comments formatted with a leading star and a space (as is usually done for exported comments).

Version:
1.3 (2008/03/30 12:43:18)
Maintainer:
Bruno Essmann <essmann@sourceforge.net>
Since:
1.9.1
